summary: Provides a suite of fast unit tests for the Stable Diffusion SSD-1B ControlNet pipeline, checking integration of dummy components, verification of conditioning channel handling, and validation of ControlNet behavior with SDXL models in both guess and LCM configurations, as well as IP‑adapter functionality.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the ControlNet‑enhanced diffusion pipeline during development and continuous integration, enabling rapid detection of regressions in core features.
